column2: This [GetGirlWomanBoyMan] is currently away on a pilgrimage.
This [GetGirlWomanBoyMan] has not been officialy coronated, hurting their legitimacy.
This [GetGirlWomanBoyMan] has been coronated, as befits a ruler belonging to the Eternal Way.
This character is a veteran holy warrior who obtained victory in a Dharmayuddh.
